name: Beeware (swedewagon)
description:
Your hive is under attack! 
It's your job to protect it as the queen bee. Send out drones, build walls, manage resources and do whatever else you can to save your colony.
(Just try to get a score as high as possible).

Trailer:

https://youtu.be/gsxmBY_E_S0

Controls:

Left mouse button - Shoot

Right mouse button - build

B - Bomb

Esc - Go back to main menu from game

This game was made as a part of a university course.

Made by:

  • Andrei Moldovean - Open Minor
  • Ciaran Lynch - Programmer
  • Einar Dahlén Hansson - Open Minor
  • Elin Lindberg - Graphics
  • Emma Andersson - Graphics
  • Mahmood Attar Zoghi - Project manager
  • Philip Ågren Oskarsson - Programmer

Sound effects & Music obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Public domain sounds & music obtained at https://opengameart.org/content/guitar-tunes.
